airtrafficcontrol.app.appforconsole

Class AirTrafficControlAppForConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • airtrafficcontrol.app.AirTrafficControlApp
      • airtrafficcontrol.app.appforconsole.AirTrafficControlAppForConsole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AirTrafficControlAppForConsole
extends AirTrafficControlApp
    Class whose instances represent Air Traffic Control apps runnable in a console.

    • Field Detail

      • dataTools

        public final ConsoleDataToolbox dataTools
        The app's tools (defines its options menu, its console output formatter, creates the app's airships database and its reports generator).

    • Constructor Detail

      • AirTrafficControlAppForConsole

        public AirTrafficControlAppForConsole(java.lang.String appTitle,
                                      java.lang.String appDeveloper,
                                      java.lang.String menuTitle,
                                      char symbolOfSectionDelimiter,
                                      int lengthOfSectionDelimiter,
                                      int numberOfBlankLinesBetweenSections,
                                      Option... options)
                               throws InvalidArgumentException
        Creates an instance of AirTrafficControlAppForConsole that features:

        • the title appTitle;
        • a menu with the title menuTitle and the options options
        • an initially empty flights' database;
        • a reports generator;
        • a console output formatter that draws a line filled with a sequence of lengthOfSectionDelimiter repetitions of the symbol symbolOfTheSectionDelimiter as a section delimiter and prints numberOfBlankLinesBetweenSections blank lines of space between sections
        • a console input handler.

        Parameters:
        appTitle - This app's title.
        menuTitle - This app's menu's title.
        symbolOfSectionDelimiter - The symbol to be repeated in the output's section delimiter.
        lengthOfSectionDelimiter - The length of the output's section delimiter.
        numberOfBlankLinesBetweenSections - The number of lines to be left between the app's output sections.
        options - This app's menu's options.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - If null arguments are inserted; or if appTitle, appDeveloper or menuTitle are given the empty string; or if lengthOfSectionDelimiter or numberOfBlankLinesBetweenSections are <1.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the app.

        Presents the welcoming message followed by the options menu, allows the user to select the option from the menu to be executed, executes the option, returns to the menu, allows the user to select another option, ... . After the exiting option is selected, presents a goodbye message and the final credits, and exits.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Specified by:
        run in class AirTrafficControlApp
